General.Name: Advanced Digital Chips Inc
General.Description: Advanced Digital Chips Inc. designs, manufactures, sells semiconductor and non-memory semiconductor South Korea. It also engages in the manufacture and sale of refrigerator; semiconductor distribution; and fashion businesses. The company was formerly known as Asia Design Corporation and changed its name to Advanced Digital Chips Inc. in October 2000. Advanced Digital Chips Inc. was founded in 1996 and is based in Anyang-si, South Korea.
General.Address: Building A, Geumgang Penterium IT Tower, Anyang-Si, South Korea
